mapper.insert: insert into position (positioncode, positionname, rank, usestatus, relate, positionstatus) values (#{positionCode},#{positionName},#{rank} ,nvl(#{useStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),nvl(#{relate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),#{positionStatus})
mapper.select: select positioncode, positionname, rank, usestatus, relate, positionstatus from position
select positioncode, positionname, rank, usestatus, relate, positionstatus from position where positioncode = #{positioncode}
